Title: AppId
Description: ID of the Adoptify Power App

Title: InactiveDays
Description: No of inactive days before a user is reminded to open Adoptify

Title: FirstLaunchBadgeID
Description: ID of the badge to award to a user on their first launch of Adoptify

Title: LanguageOverride
Description: Default Adoptify language ISO code. If blank, will autodetect.

Title: SupportEmail
Description: Email address of a contact who will support Adoptify internally.

Title: QuestApproverEmail
Description: Email address of a user or group that will approve the completion of custom quests.

Title: QuestApprovalUseTeams
Description: Use Microsoft Teams for custom quest approval. Posts adaptive cards instead of using Power Automate Approvals.

Title: QuestApprovalTeamId
Description: ID of a Microsoft Teams Team to use for custom quest approval.

Title: QuestApprovalChannelId
Description: ID of a Microsoft Teams Channel to use for custom quest approval.

Title: RewardApprovers
Description: Semicolon separated list of approver email addresses who will approve rewards that require approval or the email address of a Microsoft 365 group.

Title: RewardCodeAdminEmail
Description: Email address of a single user who will provide codes for rewards that require a unique code but do not require approval.

Title: RewardRedemptionTeamId
Description: ID of a Microsoft Teams Team where an adaptive card will be posted to provide codes for rewards that require a unique code but do not require approval. Used instead of the RewardCodeAdminUPN setting.

Title: RewardRedemptionChannelId
Description: ID of a Microsoft Teams Channel where an adaptive card will be posted to provide codes for rewards that require a unique code but do not require approval.
